channel.title: Attackable NPC's
channel.description:
[center]I got a pimpscape source and I'm trying to develop a Slayer Tower. The NPC's that I would like to add are something like Abberrant Specters, Gargoyels, Nechreayals, and Abbysal Demons. If anyone has a Tut for putting in Attackable NPC's post here because I can't find one on Server Tutorials.[/center]
[center]Also is there any way to edit what those attackable NPC's drop?[/center]
[center]Thanks.[/center]
[center]Billy[/center]

item.title: Attackable NPC's
